Articles.Content:
The command seat tooltip icon is missing in the VAB.

It's an annoying bug as I use this icon for my mod (KIS). Right now the command seat can't be used because of this.

Thanks to fix this issue.

I made a workaround for this bug: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129846-KSP-Alpha-Cutoff-shader-is-partially-broken-or-used-in-unintended-way](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129846-KSP-Alpha-Cutoff-shader-is-partially-broken-or-used-in-unintended-way)
